KnightEDU.courses
Class Course

java.lang.Object
  KnightEDU.courses.Course

public class Course
extends java.lang.Object

Describes a course identified by a CourseID.

Version:
3/12/11
Author:
Alexander Darino
See Also:
CourseID, Credits, Grade, Prequisites, Course.Offering
